column5: This is a Efficacy unit in beautiful historic down town Elgin Texas, 20 minutes from Austin .Quiet time after 10pm. Disclose all guests, please. Additional overnight guests must be approved and may be subject to additional.  Daytime guests should be minimal.  Please make yourself at home and leave the the unit in condition you found it in . Dishes should be rinsed and placed in the dishwasher.  Please put trash in trash can outside in the alley. (any can will do.) Not suitable for young childre
